info.name: Dark Twitter by TheBatmop
info.description:
Preserves your Link-Color and Background Image!

You shouldn't expect an update if you doesn't tell me what I'd have to update, I'm a programmer, I'm all day busy so I can't check or search for bugs by myself.

So FEEL FREE (and a little bit compelled if you really want an update) to tell me what is going wrong. Oh and thanks for downloading!!

Bugs to @Punkuntildie (Or suggest me a page to make a style)
info.additionalInfo:
Upcoming Update (Sept.##.2014)
 + Full-Width version available again
 + 3 Font-Size choices (Small is the default) [By Request]
 + Default Twitter Fonts version [By Request]
 + Finished config pages
 + Improved some visual elements
 + Fixed some things
 + Fixed hardly readable fonts because of their colors
 + Other minor fixes

Update (May.12.2014)
 + Rewritten complete style (not finished yet)
 + Updated to new profile page and other changes
 + Full-Width option will be not available until next update

Update (February.5.2014)
 + Fixed several visual bugs caused by official Twitter page changes
 + Minor changes on Full-Width option
 + Updated style screenshots

Update (April.6.2013)
 + Full-Width version now works again

Update (March.26.2013)
 + Tweet/Box Link-Color turns white on hover (For profiles with dark Link-Colors)
 + Themed the new "View all Photos and Videos" thing
 + Black search bar
 + Fixed Login-menu
 + Fixed 6-Image-Preview on profiles

Update (March.15.2013)
 + Fixed List main page
 + Darker topbar

Update (Feb.22.2013)
 + More minor fixes
 + Added a "Full-Width Tweets" choice
 + Minor fixes
 + Updated "before" image

Update (Feb.19.2013)
 + Fixed Header-image-uploader, now you can see your uploaded image

Update (Feb.18.2013)
 + Wider Tweets
 + Changes on profile panel
 + "Woo hoo! your password has been changed!" Screen
 + Other minor changes to style
 + Fixed reply box in DM, now appears black again
 + Fixed Apps page
 + Fixed some things in settings page
 + Minor fixes

Update (Feb.14.2013)
 + Tweet-Quotes (http://i.imgur.com/0BzRwIC.png)
 + Fixed reply box, now appears black again
 + Fixed "Thanks, your settings have been saved." text
 + Fixed gray thing in mini-profile
 + Changed "New Tweets" thing

Update (Dec.24.2012)
 + Lighter border around all page modules (for easy viewing in dark backgrounds)
 + White border around menus and opened tweets/conversations (for easy viewing)
 + "Sorry, that page doesnâ€™t exist!" page
 + Keyboard shorcuts page

Update (Dec.22.2012)
 + Fixed advanced search page

Update (Dec.21.2012)
 + Fixed "Top People" thing in searchs

Update (Dec.19.2012)
 + Finished and fixed all main pages (All tabs and sub-tabs)
 + Fixed menu things, settings page and DM page
 + Fixed profile preview that appears when you click on the name of someone
 + Other minor fixes

Thanks for downloading

Release (Dec.18.2012)

+ First release, so many bugs, incomplete style
